name: Bike Flip Diving - Stunt Race
description:
One of the Most addictive Bike Stunt Diving game on AppStore!

Feel as if you are diving with a Bike performing some crazy Stunts !!

Bike Diving Flip Stunt gives you the thrilling experience of real Bike Stunts .

* Featuring incredible physics engine with animated rag doll physics.
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* 30 Exciting Levels


Download Now!!!
